Sigman is an art and culture enthusiast. Between 2010 and 2013, he was a member of the Advisory Council of the [National Fine Arts Museum of Argentina](/w/index.php?title=National_Fine_Arts_Museum_of_Argentina&action=edit&redlink=1). He is a member of the Board of Patronage of [Museo Reina Sofía](/wiki/Museo_Reina_Sof%C3%ADa), in Madrid, Spain.
